description: Topped with asparagus, chickpeas, mushrooms and pizza shred, this creative roasted cauliflower dish will definitely impress loved ones.
name: Roasted Cauliflower & Asparagus Melts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 bunches asparagus, sliced at an angle
1kg whole cauliflower, cut into 4 x 1.5cmthick slices
0.33 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus 1 tbs extra to drizzle
425g no added salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place cauliflower on one tray. Drizzle over 2 tbs oil on both sides. Season and place into oven.FI

Place chickpeas, lemon juice, garlic, thyme and 1 tbs oil in a bowl. Using a fork, roughly smash. Season. Transfer to other tray. Place into oven with cauliflower and bake both for 15 minutes or until chickpeas are slightly crisp. Remove chickpea tray from oven and set aside.
Toss mushrooms and remaining oil in a bowl and season. Turn cauliflower over and top with mushroom. Bake for a further 5 minutes or until softened.
Top with asparagus and pizza shred. Cook for a further 5 minutes or until pizza shred melts. Spoon over chickpea mixture, drizzle over extra oil and serve.
